mapper.select: select o.*, g.intro goodIntro, g.celebrity_price payment, g.name goodName, g.type goodType, u1.real_name seller, g.img goodImg, g.intro goodName, g.good_id goodId, u2.real_name celebrityName, a1.human consignor, a2.human consignee from tb_order o left join users u1 on o.eshop = u1.account left join users u2 on o.celebrity = u2.account left join goods g on o.id = g.good_id left join address a1 on o.deliver_address = a1.address_id left join address a2 on o.receive_address = a2.address_id where o.celebrity = #{account} and o.status = #{status} order by o.status, o.pay_time desc limit #{start}, 10;

select o.*, g.intro goodIntro, g.celebrity_price payment, g.name goodName, g.type goodType, u1.real_name seller, g.img goodImg, g.intro goodName, g.good_id goodId, u2.real_name celebrityName, a1.human consignor, a2.human consignee from tb_order o left join users u1 on o.eshop = u1.account left join users u2 on o.celebrity = u2.account left join goods g on o.id = g.good_id left join address a1 on o.deliver_address = a1.address_id left join address a2 on o.receive_address = a2.address_id where o.celebrity = #{account} and o.status != 7 order by o.status, o.pay_time desc limit #{start}, 10;
